Method Detail

addSource

public boolean addSource(String name,
                         String link)
addSource method is used to add a new source to the database.

Parameters:
name - Name of the source that needed to be added.
link - Link of the source that needed to be added.
Returns:
Returns a boolean variable stating if the adding is successful.

getSourceCount

public int getSourceCount()
getSourceCount is used to get the current number of sources that is in the database.

Returns:
Returns the count of sources in the database.

getSourceLink

public String getSourceLink(int id)
getSourceLink is a method for extracting the http address of the source based on the source id(starts from 1).

Parameters:
id - ID number of the expected source.
Returns:
Returns a String representation of the link of the source.

getSourceName

public String getSourceName(int id)
getSourceName is a method for extracting the name of the source based on the source id(starts from 1).

Parameters:
id - ID number of the expected source.
Returns:
Returns a String representation of the name of the source.

public void ParseSource()
ParseSource is a method used for reading the database.xml file.

removeSource

public boolean removeSource(int id)
removeSource method is used to remove an existing source to the database.

Parameters:
id - ID number of the source that needed to be removed
Returns:
Returns a boolean variable stating if the removing is successful.

                             String link)
setSourceLink is the method for editing the http link of the source.

Parameters:
